author: timesunion.com
title: Rodger's Quick Take
text: The Bengals will not go undefeated, and the Bills need a signature win in the Rex Ryan era. I don't consider Buffalo's win over Indianapolis a signature win, because the Colts are mediocre this season. But a win over a very good Cincinnati team would turn some heads, and, more important, it would put the Bills two games over .500. They will need to play their best game of the season to beat Cincinnati, because this is the best Bengals team we have seen in a long time. Andy Dalton is having a great season, and their defense is for real, too. NewsChannel 13's Rodger Wyland can be heard weekdays from 9 a.m. to noon on WOFX 980 AM.
